explanation: [0-0] The screen shows a game interface, with a blue jeep and a man inside leaning out holding a bouquet of red roses. A woman in a pink tight dress is standing on the pedestrian crossing. The upper left corner of the screen displays the player's information (avatar, level, etc.), while the upper right corner shows information such as gold coins and experience points.
